description: Convert the raw text to task result.

params.name: task
params.description: The task name for the Taskflow, and get the task class from the name.

params.name: model
params.description: The model name in the task, if set None, will use the default model.

params.name: mode
params.description: Select the mode of the task, only used in the tasks of word_segmentation and ner.If set None, will use the default mode.

params.name: device_id
params.description: The device id for the gpu, xpu and other devices, the defalut value is 0.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Additional keyword arguments passed along to the specific task.
